system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.

Effect: The user may freely move up to double their Overland Score when declaring this attack. On hit, all valid targets have a 60% chance losing -1 DEF stage for 5 activations.

Requirement: [Incineroar] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Darkest Lariat on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Malicious Moonsault

cost.trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.
